contextId.occurrenceNote: "There will be a kingdom number four" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-ordinal]])
contextId.glQuote: There will be a fourth kingdom

contextId.occurrenceNote: The gods were believed to shine brightly with light. Alternate translation: "Man four is shining brightly with light as a son of the gods would shine" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-ordinal]] and [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-simile]])
contextId.glQuote: The brilliance of the fourth is like a son of the gods

contextId.occurrenceNote: "year 3 of the rule of Cyrus the king of Persia" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-ordinal]])
contextId.glQuote: the third year of Cyrus king of Persia

contextId.occurrenceNote: "after them a fourth king will come into power who will have more money than the three before him" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/translate-ordinal]])
contextId.glQuote: a fourth will be far richer than all the others
